amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the scope of the rulemaking moratorium to the issuance of substantive rules, interpretative rules, statements of agency policies, or notices of proposed rulemaking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 35 in the Congressional Record of February 22) to reduce the scope of the rulemaking moratorium to the issuance of substantive rules, interpretative rules, statements of agency policies, or notice of proposed rulemaking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 271 (Roll no. 170).
